meanings.sent1: The missing key was unfindable in the cluttered drawer.
meanings.sent2: The treasure chest was unfindable after the storm buried it in sand.
meanings.sent3: The unfindable sock seemed to have vanished into thin air.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was unfindable as she searched for her lost phone.
meanings.sent5: The unfindable solution to the puzzle left them scratching their heads.

meanings.sent1: The unfindable address led them in circles around the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The unfindable book was nowhere to be seen on the library shelves.
meanings.sent3: His unfindable sense of direction always made road trips an adventure.
meanings.sent4: The unfindable truth finally came to light after years of secrecy.
meanings.sent5: The unfindable scent of fresh flowers lingered in the air.
